New Records: Cape Verde secured a berth to the round of 16 at the on-going AFCON 2023 tournament in Cote D'Ivoire, becoming the first country to make the grade.
Key Match Events: Tiago Manuel Dias Correia (Bebe) struck a brilliant free kick from distance to give Cape Verde the 1-0 lead by the mandatory half time break.
Mendes added the second goal six minutes into the second half.
Pina capped the icing on the already baked cake with the third goal, scorching long range shot from 30 yards past goalkeeper Alberto Ernan Siluane.
Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde had earned six points from two games after a 2-1 win over Ghana Black Stars.
Post-Match Reflections: Mendes was named the man of the match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Egypt has two points whilst Ghana and Mozambique have a point apiece.
With Cape Verde already qualified, group B remains wide open coming to the final games for the remaining three countries Egypt, Ghana and Mozambique.
Others: The match was played at the Stade Felix Houphouet Boigny on Friday afternoon.
